attributes.action: challenge Barclays First Plus Loans over their interest rates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Barclays First Plus loans are causing untold stress and hardship over, not only their failure to drop interest rates, but in many cases actually raising them.  They should be forced to fall into line with current interest rates.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
